Stylish & Modern Bathroom Remodeling

More than a bathroom — the luxurious spa experience you’ve always wanted.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Bathroom-remodel-service-1.jpg” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|true”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off”]

Great designs. Better service.

Bathroom too small? Dreaming about a new soaking tub? His and hers vanities? Radiant heating? A space to relax at the end of a long and tiring day?

Mosaik’s design-build bathroom remodeling services can truly transform any Portland-area bathroom. There’s no limit to what’s possible!

When our designers and builders work together, the result is a seamless design executed to perfection. We believe your bathroom should be a reflection of you and your needs.

Our attention to detail is impeccable and our skills are second to none. We’re passionate about design styles and bringing functional, stylish, and luxurious bathrooms to life.

We design it. We build it. You love it.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonials and Awards” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_image=”off” background_repeat=”repeat-y” background_blend=”soft-light” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”|10%||10%|false|true”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_slider module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”70%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” min_height=”340px” min_height_tablet=”” min_height_phone=”” min_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”|auto||15%|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto||auto|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||auto|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Erin brought in some excellent ideas and Scott was ultra-attentive to the construction details, only the best quality materials and truly professional subs were used. Everything was built with safety and durability in mind. There are faster/cheaper options out there, but we are happy that we chose Erin and Scott for their quality work.

– ANTON C.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][et_pb_slider disabled_on=”on|on|off” module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” min_height=”340px” min_height_tablet=”” min_height_phone=”” min_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”|15%||auto|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto|||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||5%” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Scott and Erin an excellent team – Erin has a lovely design aesthetic and outstanding customer service and Scott is a detailed project manager and skilled contractor. They are both such a pleasure to work with. Erin and Scott are very responsive and accommodating to our requests. I can’t recommend them highly enough.

– DENISE D.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Global-Master-Bathroom-5.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|false”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off”]

Do you know design-build?

Bathroom remodeling doesn’t have to be a drag. We’ve created a design-build process that eliminates the headaches, hassles, and stresses of the traditional bathroom remodeling process.

We’re a one-stop shop and we take care of everything from conception to construction, all thanks to careful and thorough:

  • Preparation – Our bathroom designers and builders work closely together as one seamless team. There’s no confusion and we eliminate the hassles traditionally associated with bathroom remodeling.
  • Collaboration – We work together — and with you — throughout the project. We’ll check in and update you on how things are progressing. You’ll never feel left out of the loop.
  • Execution – Our expert bathroom contractors work quickly and efficiently to minimize the disruption to your family’s life.

That’s the difference design-build makes.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ Say hello!

Interior design done right

Colors, accent pieces, appliances, furniture, and everything else you need to put a bow on your newly remodeled bathroom. Our interior designers take pride in wowing our clients with their attention to detail and on-trend knowledge of the latest design styles and motifs.

Down to the smallest detail, our experienced interior designers put the finishing touches on your newly remodeled bathroom. We can recommend luxury appliances, stylish furnishings, artwork, and anything else that’s needed. Best of all, you’ll work with our interior designers from the very beginning of your bathroom remodel to ensure everything fits perfectly into place.

LEARN MORE

excerpt.rendered: Stylish & Modern Bathroom Remodeling More than a bathroom — the luxurious spa experience you’ve always wanted.Great designs. Better service. Bathroom too small? Dreaming about a new soaking tub? His and hers vanities? Radiant heating? A space to relax at the end of a long and tiring day? Mosaik’s design-build bathroom remodeling services can truly […]
